summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsSustainable PackagingAnua Rice 70 Intensive Moisturizing Milk is non-sticky moisturizing lotion contains rice bran water and ceramides to hydrate and brighten the skin with a refreshing finish, to help achieve clear and healthy skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsLightweight milky toner for glass skinFor all skin typesFragrance-freeKey Ingredients70% ANUA Rice Water+: Helps ImproveSkin Clarity & BalanceNiacinamide: Improves Dull ComplexionCeramides + Squalane: Hydrates & Nourishes the Skin with MoistureResearch ResultsSkin irritation test completedNon-comedogenic test completedAFTER 4 WEEKS:131.478% improvement in oil content120% improvement in skin sebum levels101.688% in skin tone (brightness)122.018% in outer skin hydrationItem 2641339How To UseUse after cleansing and toning.Pat gently over the entire face for better absorption.Use after cleansing as both AM & PM regimen.IngredientsOryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Water, Hydrogenated Poly(c6-14 Olefin), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Phytosteryl/Octyldodecyl Lauroyl Glutamate, 1,2-hexanediol, Diglycerin, Cetyl Ethylhexanoate, Water, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Glyceryl Stearate, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Vinyl Dimethicone, Behenyl Alcohol, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Extract, Polysorbate 20, Cetearyl Alcohol, Arginine, Hydroxyacetophenone, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Xanthan Gum, Adenosine, Carbomer, Cholesterol, Dipropylene Glycol, Ceramide NP, Sorbitan Isostearate, Lactobacillus Ferment Filtrate, Squalane, Allantoin, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Seed Protein, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Tocopherol, Ectoin, Phytosphingosine, Palmitic Acid, Stearic Acid, Sodium Hyaluronate, Ceramide As, Ceramide Ap, Ceramide Ns, Hydrolyzed Hyaluronic Acid, Sodium Acetylated Hyaluronate, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Ceramide EOP.
how_to_use: Use after cleansing and toning.Pat gently over the entire face for better absorption.Use after cleansing as both AM & PM regimen.

reviews.headline: I will be purchasing again
reviews.comments: Omg, I live this moisturizer.  It is so hydrating and gives me the best glow.

reviews.headline: Loved product
reviews.comments: Makes my skin feel so soft. Will recommend it to anyone

reviews.headline: My favourite now.
reviews.comments:
There's only few not clean ingredients but the rest of the ingredients are Naturals. It is hydrating, gives me a smooth skin texture, no fragrances, almost clean ingredients but hoping they can replace for example the 1,2-Hexanediol with natural. The Diglycerin is questionable for me if it is made of natural or just synthetic so (who knows!). 

Pretty satisfied with how it works for my dry, sensitive skin. 
You can't go wrong with rice bran, it always satisfied me.

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review. This Auna Rice 70 Intensive Moisturizing Milk does wonders for my skin! My skin is hydrated and looks bright! My skin is a lot more clear and moisturized as someone with dry skin. I love the texture of This Auna Rice 70 Intensive Moisturizing Milk, it is very satisfying to use

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: This is really moisturizing and non greasy,I have a combination acne prone skin and my skin loves this.No breakouts ,heaviness or irritation.it also absorbs really quickly into the skin I received this product in exchange for my honest review

reviews.headline: Moisturizing and non greasy
reviews.comments:
This is really moisturizing and non greasy,I have a combination acne prone skin and my skin loves this.No breakouts ,heaviness or irritation.it also absorbs really quickly into the skin
I received this product in exchange for my honest review

reviews.headline: Lightweight and hydrating!
reviews.comments: We love a good moisturizing milky product. I havent tried many other products from Anua but this one is in my top. It's a super lightweight formula but not runny. It easily distributes and melts into the skin leaving a bouncy glass skin glow. Its made with key ingredients of rice water, niacinamide, ceramides and squalane. The packaging is sleek and easy to use, minimal but informative. I've use this product on its own, with the rest of my skincare rountine and also under makeup for an extra glowy appearance. Overall I really enjoyed this product. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Lightweight
reviews.comments: Very lightweight honestly disappears very quickly when applied. Doesn't have a scent whatsoever, is a thin consistency. It does leave the skin feeling bouncy and moisturized but does take a while to dry down. On its own I don't think it'll be very hydrating so mix it with other products.

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: The Anua Rice 70% Intensive Moisturizing Milk is a dream for dry, tired skin. It has a lightweight, milky texture that sinks in beautifully without feeling greasy or heavy. My skin instantly feels soft, hydrated, and soothed, and it leaves behind the prettiest natural glow. The 70% rice extract helps brighten and even out my skin tone over time, and I've definitely noticed a more radiant, healthy look. It layers well with other products and doesn't pill under makeup. Perfect for sensitive skin days or when I need something simple but effective. This is one of those moisturizers that feels like skincare and self-care in one—gentle, hydrating, and glow-boosting.

reviews.headline: Anua milky toner
reviews.comments: I haven't been using this toner for a while now, this is a must for me as I seen such a difference in my skin hydration and glow!! No more dry patchy skin or feature skin!! After using this my skin feels smooths and so hydrated after using this on daily basis I noticed all other skincare and even make up goes on so nicely!! Over this is a must have!

reviews.headline: I love this!!!!
reviews.comments:
This product is amazing!!!!!! It's lightweight yet deeply Hydrating. It goes perfectly under my makeup and SPF. Korean skincare is where it is at!!!!!!
This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: My go to moisturizer!
reviews.comments: Anua Rice Moisturizing Milk is lightweight but a deeply hydrating lotion that leaves my skin feeling soft, smooth, and refreshed. I love how the rice bran water and ceramides work together to boost moisture while brightening my complexion without any stickiness. It absorbs quickly and gives a healthy, natural glow . It's perfect for daily use under sunscreen or makeup. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review..

reviews.headline: Moisturizing
reviews.comments: I recently tried the Rice 70 Moisturizing Milk. The first thing I noticed was its light texture. It feels super smooth when you apply it. It's not greasy at all, which is fantastic since I don't like using heavy creams. Just a small amount goes a long way, making it great value for money. After using it for a few days, I really felt a difference in how my skin looked and felt.  Rice is known for its hydrating properties, and I believe it really works! My skin felt nourished and loved after each use. Plus, it has a light and pleasant scent that's not overpowering. It's refreshing, almost like a spring day. I appreciate products that leave a subtle fragrance without making it seem like I've dumped a whole bottle of perfume on myself. I received this for my honest review.

reviews.headline: I love this product! Great price point too!
reviews.comments: Product was received as part of an educational promotion. I really enjoyed this product, as it very hydrating while still being light weight and great for layering with other products like the ANUA 3 Ceramide Pathenol Moisture Barrier Cream. I have a very dry skin type with combination of hormonal acne prone skin and this product was great for me. I felt hydrated while not flaring up my acne. It actually kept my acne at bay, so I highly recommend this product for all skin types!

reviews.headline: Love love love
reviews.comments: So I used to be obsessed with the Murad Skin Perfecting lotion and then their brand discontinued it and I have never been able to find something like it….until now!! Love that it's fragrance free and lightweight on the skin. I do tend to lean dry with combination skin so I will use a richer cream at night but this works perfectly for the day in the hot Florida heat! I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Lightweight Moisturizing
reviews.comments: So I do indeed like this moisturizer and I would recommend it to someone who doesn't need as much intense moisture in their skin as I do. I drink a lot of water but my skin still needs a lot of moisture. My skin tends to be very dry, itchy, and the texture can be uneven. It can be a struggle to get my skin to hold moisture. Immediately after using this moisturizer my skin does feel slightly more plump and moisturized. There's no fragrance and I found the formula to be slightly soothing. When I felt the very watery and thin texture of the moisturizer I knew it wasn't going to be thick or rich enough to be my every day moisturizer. My skin soaked up the moisturizer and went back to looking dry too quickly for my liking. I think this would be best for those with normal to combination type skin. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review

reviews.headline: Moisturizing while delivering SPF
reviews.comments: My daytime SPF lately has been Rice 70 Intensive Moisturizing Milk from Anua. It packs in a punch of moisture with a heavy dose of SPF, without the whitecast. Plus, it absorbs easily into my skin and layers beautifully on top of serums and under moisturizer. And as someone with sensitive skin, I appreciate that there's no scent!

reviews.headline: Rice Milk but Luxury
reviews.comments: This ain't your average rice water hack. The Rice 70 Intensive Moisturizing Milk is what happens when ancient skincare traditions meet luxury K-beauty innovation. It's lightweight like a serum, but moisturizes like a cream — and I mean deeply. The texture is silky and smooth, perfect for layering in a routine or using solo when your skin just needs a quick sip of something nourishing. What I love most? It brightens without being harsh. Rice extract helps even out tone and soften the skin over time, so your glow isn't just surface level — it's real, healthy, and lasting. Plus, it absorbs in seconds with zero stickiness, so your skin just feels smooth and plump, not coated. Ideal for oily, combo, or sensitive skin, and a gem under SPF or makeup.

reviews.headline: hydrating
reviews.comments:
I have been using the Rice 70 Intensive Moisturizing Milk for about a week and I really enjoy it. The bottle is tall and smooth with a gentle creamy liquid inside. I pour a little into my hand and it feels soft and silky. When I apply it to my face and neck after washing, it spreads easily and absorbs in a minute. My skin feels gentle and plump right away.

After two or three days I noticed that the dry spots around my cheeks and forehead looked calmer. My face felt more even and less tight. I like how it gives a soft glow without any shine. At night I use it before bed and in the morning my skin feels fresh and more balanced. It works well under sunscreen and makeup in the day.

I have skin that can be sensitive and it did not cause any red marks or breakouts. It feels soothing and gentle, kind of like a light hug for the skin. I like that it is not heavy or greasy. It leaves my skin feeling clean and fresh.

I really like how easy and simple it is to use. It fits well in my routine and does not feel like a chore. I like that it gives soft moisture that lasts without feeling coating.

This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.headline: Perfect daytime moisturizer
reviews.comments: This is my new go to moisturizer. I have normal to dry skin and am trying to improve my skin barrier and texture. It is hydrating without being too thick, and layers well under makeup - no pilling, no grease. It feels really hydrating, and like it's actually being absorbed into my skin. Great daytime moisturizer. This product was provided for promotional purposes in exchange for my honest review

media.headline: Adds glow to skin immediately, highly moisturizing.
Adds glow to skin immediately, highly moisturizing.
A lightweight yet deeply moisturizing lotion that leaves you

faceoff_positive.comments:
I'm not new to this brand and frankly, I've never really had a strong positive impression of Anua to begin with, so I was curious if this product might shift that. As someone in her late 20s focusing on preventative care, hydration and fighting hyperpigmentation are my two key focuses in skincare.

The Anua Rice 70 + Ceramide Intensive Moisturizing Milk kind of shifted my original impressions of this brand. For reference, I have oily/combination skin.

🍚  The packaging of this sleek and easy to use. Aesthetics-wise though, it pulls a little clinical at first glance but I can see the apothecary-inspired angle they were going for. 

🍚 The formula is surprisingly lightweight and absorbs well. This is such a pro for me as I have combination/oily skin type. I found this perfect for use in the hot weather as my pores don't feel congested.

🍚 I've noticed a visible reduction in oiliness after using this for about two weeks. My skin looks and feels more balanced, and my makeup applies more smoothly.

🍚 This moisturizer contains rice water, rice extract, and ceramides. I'm particularly a fan of rice-based skincare as it was one of the first skincare type to even my skin tone. Some great skincare ingredients included in this are niacinamide (brightening, anti-acne, moisturizing), phytosphingosine (anti-acne, skin-renewing), rice bran oil (antioxidant), Allantoin and Ectoin (for soothing).

🍚 This would be great for any skin type as it does not contain irritating ingredients. For the price it retails for ($20), I think this is well worth the price and would consider repurchasing this. 

*I received this complimentary in exchange for an honest review. All thoughts are my own.
faceoff_positive.headline: Lightweight Hydration that Seriously Impressed Me

faceoff_negative.comments: So I do indeed like this moisturizer and I would recommend it to someone who doesn't need as much intense moisture in their skin as I do. I drink a lot of water but my skin still needs a lot of moisture. My skin tends to be very dry, itchy, and the texture can be uneven. It can be a struggle to get my skin to hold moisture. Immediately after using this moisturizer my skin does feel slightly more plump and moisturized. There's no fragrance and I found the formula to be slightly soothing. When I felt the very watery and thin texture of the moisturizer I knew it wasn't going to be thick or rich enough to be my every day moisturizer. My skin soaked up the moisturizer and went back to looking dry too quickly for my liking. I think this would be best for those with normal to combination type skin.
